member.name: FsiItemType
member.summary: Defines values for the file system item that was found using the method.

member.name: FsiItemType.FsiItemNotFound
member.summary: The specified item was not found.

member.name: FsiItemType.FsiItemDirectory
member.summary: The specified item is a directory.

member.name: FsiItemType.FsiItemFile
member.summary: The specified item is a file.
